title: Azir, Ziggs or Syndra
body:
I know it might seem weird because They might be the same in a few ways be totally different in a lot others.  Umm I'm just wondering what champion should i buy next to main in the mid.  Out of the 3 I'm asking what champ would be the best for ranked 5s and what would be viable in season 5.  

Feel free to add any other reason what said champ you picked is viable in both and if you pick a champ I didn't list feel free to point that out as well.
